


rrdtool                                             RRDRESTORE(1)



NNNNAAAAMMMMEEEE
     rrdtool restore - restore the contents of an RRRRRRRRDDDD from its
     XML dump format

SSSSYYYYNNNNOOOOPPPPSSSSIIIISSSS
     rrrrrrrrddddttttoooooooollll rrrreeeessssttttoooorrrreeee _f_i_l_e_n_a_m_e_._x_m_l _f_i_l_e_n_a_m_e_._r_r_d [--------rrrraaaannnnggggeeee----cccchhhheeeecccckkkk|----rrrr]

DDDDEEEESSSSCCCCRRRRIIIIPPPPTTTTIIIIOOOONNNN
     The rrrreeeessssttttoooorrrreeee function reads the XML representation of an RRD
     and converts it into the native RRRRRRRRDDDD format.

     _f_i_l_e_n_a_m_e_._x_m_l
             The name of the XXXXMMMMLLLL you want to restore.

     _f_i_l_e_n_a_m_e_._r_r_d
             The name of the RRRRRRRRDDDD to restore.

     --------rrrraaaannnnggggeeee----cccchhhheeeecccckkkk|----rrrr
             Make sure the values in the RRAs do not exceed the
             limits defined for the different datasources.

AAAAUUUUTTTTHHHHOOOORRRR
     Tobias Oetiker <oetiker@ee.ethz.ch>
